typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Cust_ID as string,
		Open_Date as date,
		Consul_Date as date,
		VAC_ID as string,
		DR_Name as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		DOB as date,
		FLAG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AllCustomers
AllCustomers split(startsWith(Country,'USA'),
	startsWith(Country,'IND'),
	startsWith(Country,'PHIL'),
	startsWith(Country,'NYC'),
	startsWith(Country,'AU'),
	disjoint: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(CustomersFromUSA, CustomersFromIND, CustomersFromPHIL, CustomersFromNYC, CustomersFromAU)
ConditionalSplit1@CustomersFromUSA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> USA
ConditionalSplit1@CustomersFromIND sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> IND
ConditionalSplit1@CustomersFromAU sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AU
ConditionalSplit1@CustomersFromNYC sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NYC
ConditionalSplit1@CustomersFromPHIL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PHIL
